% Document type with options
\documentclass[fleqn,letterpaper,12pt]{report}

% Packages
% UN5390.sty will in turn load all other required packages and (re)define 
% several aspects to fit our needs
\usepackage{UN5390}

% Information required for title portion -- DO NOT EDIT THIS PART
% Standard information
\university{Michigan Technological University}
\course{UN5390: Scientific Computing I}
\term{Fall 2015}

% Student information -- UPDATE THIS PART
\studentname{YOUR NAME}
\studentemail{YOUR-USERNAME@mtu.edu}
\advisorname{ADVISOR NAME}
\advisoremail{ADVISOR-USERNAME@mtu.edu}
\week{01}

% Document begins
\begin{document}

% Title
\assignmenttitle

\setstretch{1.0}

%
\phantomsection
\addcontentsline{toc}{section}{Problem \# 1}
\problem
INCLUDE YOUR SOLUTION FOR PROBLEM 1

%
\newpage
\phantomsection
\addcontentsline{toc}{section}{Problem \# 2}
\problem
INCLUDE YOUR SOLUTION FOR PROBLEM 2

%
\newpage
\phantomsection
\addcontentsline{toc}{section}{Problem \# 3}
\problem
INCLUDE YOUR SOLUTION FOR PROBLEM 3

\vfill
and so on.

\newpage
% References
\phantomsection
\addcontentsline{toc}{section}{References}
\section*{References}
\bibliographystyle{unsrt}
\bibliography{UN5390}

% Document ends
\end{document}
